item.title: Chalmers Reflections
item.description: Though I’ve tried to delay it by various means, my time at Chalmers university is inexorably coming to a close. This is not bitter-sweet. For me it is simply bitter and I feel a pang of loss when I think about it. Regrets University is supposed to make men out of boys. That is to say, you go in naive, confused and unsure and come out with purpose, conviction and the confidence to take on the world.
